name: A Musical Escape
description:
You have been trapped in a room!
Around you is a collection of instruments, a mask on the wall, some music and a bookshelf filled with books. Can you figure out how to escape?

A Musical Escape is a first person escape room styled experience, where solving the puzzles of the room will you allow you to exit it. It involves features like interactable objects, playable instruments and readable books.

Currently A Musical Escape is still in development as a personal project by one programmer. If you're interested, give it a try and feel free to leave feedback!

Planned features:
Proper models for all instruments, books, new mask
Better textures for the room
Unique sounds for each instrument
More sound effects
